sentences.en: Anionic polyelectrolytes can ionize in polar solvent , forming macromolecule chains with lots of anionic charge.
sentences.cn: 阴离子型聚电解质在极性溶剂中会发生电离,导致大分子链上带有大量的净负电荷.

sentences.en: As the graphic above shows, the radiation emitted in this region is nonionizing: it may heat molecules in the body but does not ionize them (that is, set electrons free).
sentences.cn: 以上图片显示，该区域内的辐射的不电离的：它只加热体内分子，并不使它们电离（即释放电子）。

sentences.en: But they do not " ionize , "'structure, " " cluster " or " magnetize " water, as various manufacturers claim.
sentences.cn: 但某些制造商宣称,洗衣球可将水 [ 离子化] 、 [ 建构] 、 [ 聚集 ] 或 [ 磁化],这就办不到了.

sentences.en: Most inorganic salts ionize in water solution.
sentences.cn: 大多数无机盐在水溶液中离解.

sentences.en: So if we can figure out the binding energy, we can also figure out how much energy we have to put into our atom in order to a eject or ionize an electron.
sentences.cn: 所以如果我们可以计算出结合能，我们也可以计算出,我们需要注入多少能量到原子中,去逐出或电离一个电子。

sentences.en: They were using the laser to excite and ionize the atoms liberated by the heat of the flame in order to measure the characteristic emissions of different flames.
sentences.cn: 当时他们用这种激光来激发并电离那些被火焰的高温裂解出来的原子，目的是测量不同火焰的特征辐射。

sentences.en: Too many charge concentrate at a sharp point may ionize the air and produced electric wind.
sentences.cn: 太多电荷集中在尖角时,会令空气电离,产生电风.

sentences.en: Weak acids ionize partly ( ionize ) in water to give hydrogen ion.
sentences.cn: 弱酸在水中部份电离 ( 电离 ),放出氢离子.

sentences.en: Weak alkalis ionize partly ( ionize ) in water to give hydroxide ion.
sentences.cn: 弱碱 在水中部份电离,放出氢氧离子.

words.tran_cn: [化学][物] 电离的；已电离的
[化学][物] 电离的；离子化的
电离；使离子化（ionize的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: to form ions or make them form
